item.title: Side-scrolling tactical RPG Wishfarers announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
About

Wishfarers is a turn-based, tactical RPG with streamlined platformer movement, explosive combat, and destructible terrain.

Wishing season is finally here, and the wishfarers are ready to get granting! Join a plucky band of adventurers as they chase shooting stars, face mysterious foes, fulfill wishes both big and silly, and find a decent pair of socks.

Play Explosive RPG Battles With Destructible Environments

Players and enemies wield an arsenal of magical abilities to use in battle: Classic fireballs and lightning bolts, helpful healing spells, buffing bard songs, otherworldly summons, astral armaments, and the pinnacle of spell slinging—Miracle Moves.

Challenge Bosses Across the Archmages’ Archipelago

The Wishfarers will battle many magnificent bosses in their star-studded quest, including the storm guardians of Mt. Plumeria, the champion of the Sasquatch Superdome, an ancient psychic gem turtle, and more!

Jump Into Turn-Based, Tactical Combat Streamlined With Platformer Movement

Players move primarily by running and jumping about the map via simple platformer controls. Additionally, characters can learn magical movement abilities such as explosive leap, kunai dash, and wind walk.

Customize Characters With Seven Classes, Over 100 Abilities, and a Multitude of Magical Socks

As the Wishfarers improve their combat prowess, players can customize each party member with a secondary suite of spells, magical movements, enchantments, and counterspells. Characters can be further outfitted with magic gloves, boots, and up to two special socks!

Explore a Whimsical World of Falling Stars and Lost Wishes

The world of Wishfarers is a wild and magical place where wizard duels break out at the drop of a sock. Rowdy monsters roam the land looking for fights. The Zodiac guild is collecting wishes to sell to the highest bidder. The Plumerians are in political turmoil. The Sasquatches will scrap as a means of saying hello. And there’s a rumor that the Scion of Stars will grant any wish in exchange for a star—even if it is not your own.

item.title: Top Hat Studios and Molegato announce 3D platformer Twinkle’s Galactic Tour for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Travel the galaxy and bash enemies to the beat.

Publisher Top Hat Studios and Frogun developer Molegato have announced 3D platformer Twinkle’s Galactic Tour for PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Travel the galaxy to rescue Twinkle’s debut concert’s audience in a low-poly, 90s anime styled, musical platforming adventure!

Play each level to the beat of a song as enemies, platforms and items all move following the beat, the melody or the drums. Uncover musical minigames or explore the personal story of an struggling (but never surrendering!) young aspirant singer.

Galaxy Round Tour

Explore neon-and-pastel alien cities, travel on Twinkle’s best friend and roadie Bav’s space van, help the locals by completing missions, sample the local cuisine or shop around for useful gear or fashionable costumes!

Collect Everything

Optional objectives in levels like finishing one try, time trials or finding the hidden CDs will grant you materials to craft power ups and tools. Find lots of secondary missions and hidden items in the open cities and return to previous areas once you’ve got new tools to reach new places!

Experience Twinkle’s and each character’s narratives through completing missions and the ‘hangout system’, in a story that is all about what it feels trying to make it out in life as an artist.

Loving the Art

Will Twinkle catch the culprit and serve justice? Find out her footing in the harsh career of music? Which friends will you choose to make? Maybe even find your love in the midst of it all?

So be a star and help Twinkle and her friends save everyone beat after beat, song after song!
